metadata.title: CVE-2018-1048 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that the AJP connector in undertow, as shipped in Jboss EAP7.1.0.GA, does not use the ALLOW_ENCODED_SLASH option and thus allow thethe slash / anti-slash characters encoded in the url which may lead to pathtraversal and result in the information disclosure of arbitrary localfiles.

criterions.comment: undertow package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
